text.content: Long ago in days untold  Were ruled by lords of greed  Maidens fared with gold they dared  To bare their wombs that bleed  Kings and queens and guillotines  Taking lives denied  Starch and parchment laid the laws  When bishops took the ride  Only to deceive  Oh I know I  Lived this life afore  Somehow I know now  Truths I must be sure  Tossin', turnin', nightmares burnin'  Dreams of swords in hand  Sailing ships, the Viking spits  The blood of father's land  Only to deceive  Living times of knights and mares  Raising swords for maidens fair  Sneer at death, fear only loss of pride  Living other centuries  Deja vu or what you please  Follows true to all who do or die  Screams of no reply  They died  Screams of no reply  And died  Died  Lordy, Lordy, they died
